#summary HIVE 2.1 Release Notes

= Release Notes =

The HIVE 2.1 release includes the following major features:
 * Ability to select terms from the indexing results page and export in multiple formats (e.g., SKOS/XML, Dublin Core, MARCXML, MODS) http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=33
 * Add Maui indexing algorithm support (http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=37)
 * Upgrade to GWT 2.3 (http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=13&can=1)
 * Add differencing support for website indexing (http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=38)
 * [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=39 Issue 39] Add support for proxy server configuration when indexing websites


The HIVE 2.1 release includes the following minor features and bug fixes:
 * Fixed minor UI bugs on home and indexing pages.
